class.name: DotnetRunStep
class.description: A [dotnet run step](https://github.com/JetBrains/teamcity-dotnet-plugin) to run .NET CLI command

function.name: dotnetRun
function.description: Adds a [dotnet run step](https://github.com/JetBrains/teamcity-dotnet-plugin) to run .NET CLI command @see DotnetRunStep

param.name: paths
param.description: Specify paths to projects and solutions. Wildcards are supported.

param.name: teamcity.build.workingDir
param.description: [Build working directory](https://confluence.jetbrains.com/display/TCDL/Build+Working+Directory) for script, specify it if it is different from the [checkout directory](https://confluence.jetbrains.com/display/TCDL/Build+Checkout+Directory).

param.name: args
param.description: Enter additional command line parameters for dotnet run.
